problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,∠CAB=70°,将△ABC绕点A逆时针旋转到△AB′C′的位置,使得CC′∥AB,则∠BAB′的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠CAB = N_0, rotate △ABC counterclockwise around point A to the position of △AB′C′, so that CC′ ∥ AB, then the degree of ∠BAB′ is ()
raw_answer: 试题解析:∵△ABC绕点A逆时针旋转到△AB'C'的位置,∴AC=AC,∠B'AB=∠C'AC,∴∠AC'C=∠ACC',∵CC//A'B,∴∠ACC′=∠CAB=70^{°},∴∠AC'C=∠ACC'=70°,∴∠CAC′=180^{°}-2×70^{°}=40^{°}.∴∠B′AB=40^{°}.故选C.
